text: Bruce Herbert Glover (born November 2, 1932, died March 12, 2025) was an American character actor. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. He was of English and Swedish descent.My hols: Crispin Glover -Times Online He was best known for his role of the assassin Mr. Wint in the James Bond movie Diamonds Are Forever. He was the father of actor Crispin Glover. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Yahoo!
